* Zyber sat leaning against the foot of her bed, the fire ahead of her 
burning bright and lighting up her small bed chamber.
She was already stiff and sore from the long journey here, and with this 
'Blasters' weight it didn't help much. But to add to that, she was tired as 
well.
Zyber stretched and yawned as she sat by the fire, but then finally got to 
her feet and looked over to the bed.
This botcreature would sleep easily tonight, but she would check up on him 
every once in a while. Other then that, she had some things to do.
Like get some breakfast, clean out the cave, store some roots and other 
variouse deeds. Ones that would keep her busy all day.
Zyber let out a tired sigh, no rest for the good.
With that she looked at the bot again, expecting to fall asleep soon, and 
then turned and began to head out of the chambers.
The words she spoke over her shoulder*

" I'll be back soon, I have to go and bring in the morning meal. Get some 
rest, I will wake you when it is ready."

* And with that she left the room, transforming into beast mode and heading 
for the exit to her den.
As she approached she spotted something that would just make her meal quest 
a little diffacult...snow.
It was falling quickly and thick, and it would cover and wild signs of her 
prey.
Oh, well...she had to try anyway, she was running low of stored meat and 
needed to restock.
So, with a shake of her fur she headed out into the snow, fading into the 
background like a ghost of the wild.*
